--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "j_cumps" =
<j_cumps@...> wrote:
>
> Hitliubo,
> 
> The type column shows:
> - The stri=
ng you enter in your assertXXX() call.
> - Stack trace of Exceptions that a=
re thrown during testing.
> 
> Each JUnit assertXXX() method allows you to =
pass a text message as 
> first parameter.
> This message will appear in th=
e type column, if your assert fails.
> 
> I don't think there is a standard=
 option to write other text to 
that 
> column.
> You would have to write y=
our own JUnitReport stylesheet to achieve 
> this.
> 
> Regards, Jan
> 
> 
=
> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "hitliubo" <hitliubo@> wrote:

report outputs serveral columns that contains:

what
